name: Animal Delivery Truck Driver
description:
The Storyline of Animal Delivery Truck Driver is to transport wild and farm animals from city to zoo or from one zoo to another. This is game is specially for those players who love driving games and transportation challenges, but don't be worry if you don't have any experience of driving Heavy Trucks. We have made the simplest and easy controls of trucks so that everyone can easily enjoy this Animal Transportation Game. You have to simulate different types of animals i-e Horse, Elephant, Bear, Zebra and Hippo. Be a real trucker in this Truck Simulator Game. Also you have to show all your parking skills in this Animal Transporter Simulator Game.

Features:
- Realistic Environment
- Excellent Graphics
- Buttons, Tilt and Steer controls
- Smooth Animals Controls
